languages.text: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

traits.locale_text: Wearer can move without provoking attacks of opportunity as long as they have less than 50% wounds left.

languages.text: 当装备者的剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，装备者在移动时不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，装备者在移动时不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Когда у персонажа меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он может двигаться, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

traits.locale_text: Когда у персонажа меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он может двигаться, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が50％以下の間、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく移動可能になる。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が50％以下の間、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく移動可能になる。

languages.text: El portador puede moverse sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} mientras tenga menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

traits.locale_text: El portador puede moverse sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} mientras tenga menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.

languages.text: Der Träger kann sich bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren, solange er weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat.
languages.original_text: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger kann sich bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren, solange er weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig hat.

languages.text: L'utilisateur peut se déplacer sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} à condition qu'il lui reste moins de 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dans sa réserve.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur peut se déplacer sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} à condition qu'il lui reste moins de 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dans sa réserve.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'den az olduğu sürece {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} tetiklemeden hareket edebilir.
